title: 5% of the Plot area under reconstruction / redevelopment project shall be surrendered to the Municipal Corporation, free of cost, towards essential amenity area, in case the plot area is more than 2500 sq
clause_text: 5% of the Plot area under reconstruction / redevelopment project shall be surrendered to the Municipal Corporation, free of cost, towards essential amenity area, in case the plot area is more than 2500 sq.mt. The FSI of such amenity area shall be permissible on the balance plot area and the entire area of such amenity space will be considered for computation of FSI, without deducting this area from the gross plot area. However,
